data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 2, Lyon's Karl Toko Ekambi misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
Memphis Depay of Lyon gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 3, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet signals a throw-in for Bordeaux, close to Lyon's area.
Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Throw-in Bordeaux.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
In the minute 9, Lyon's Moussa Dembele breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ruddy Buquet signals a Lyon throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Bordeaux.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Bordeaux capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lyon's half?
In the minute 17, Free kick Bordeaux.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Lyon in Bordeaux.
Lyon are coming forward and Bruno Guimaraes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moussa Dembele gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lyon.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
In the minute 22, Moussa Dembele (Lyon) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 23, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 26, Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Lyon.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Bordeaux in the half of Lyon.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux.
Marcelo (Lyon) has received a yellow card from Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 31, In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Nicolas De Preville for Bordeaux gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Bordeaux.
In the minute 32, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Throw-in Bordeaux.
In the minute 34, Bruno Guimaraes of Lyon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Bordeaux to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 36, Ruddy Buquet signals a Lyon throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
Ball safe as Bordeaux is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
In the minute 38, Bordeaux have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Lyon needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Lyon throw-in in Bordeaux's half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Bordeaux in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Youssouf Sabaly returns to the field for Bordeaux after picking up a slight injury.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Ruddy Buquet blows to end the first-half.
Ruddy Buquet waits before resuming play because Youssouf Sabaly for Bordeaux is still down.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Bordeaux.
Joachim Andersen (Lyon) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Lyon.
Lyon are pushing forward but Moussa Dembele's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 49, Ruddy Buquet awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux close to the penalty box.
In the minute 51, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Ruddy Buquet awards the home team a throw-in.
Lyon drive upfield and Memphis Depay gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
In the minute 52, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon surge into the attack at Matmut Atlantique but Joachim Andersen’s header is off-target.
Bordeaux have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Bordeaux in the half of Lyon.
Lyon needs to be cautious. Bordeaux have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 55, Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
Free kick Lyon.
Otavio is booked for the home team.
Lyon's Memphis Depay gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Bordeaux defender.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bordeaux's half?
Houssem Aouar is on a sub for Moussa Dembele for Lyon.
In the minute 59, Thiago Mendes is replacing Bruno Guimaraes for the away team.
Bordeaux awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The home team replace Samuel Kalu with Yacine Adli.
In the minute 63, Ruddy Buquet signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Lyon's half.
Throw-in for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Bordeaux.
Lyon's Thiago Mendes gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Bordeaux goal kick.
In the minute 66, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Lyon close to the penalty box.
Lyon's Maxwel Cornet gets in a shot on goal at Matmut Atlantique. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 68, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Joachim Andersen (Lyon) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Attention is being given to Bordeaux’s Nicolas De Preville and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 69, Nicolas De Preville is back on his feet again.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 72, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a third substitution, with Tino Kadewere replacing Memphis Depay.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
It seems as if Nicolas De Preville is unable to continue. Josh Maja replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 74, The home team have replaced Hwang Ui-Jo with Jimmy Briand. This is the third substitution made today by Jean-Louis Gasset.
Bordeaux have been awarded a corner by Ruddy Buquet.
In the minute 75, Ruddy Buquet awards Lyon a goal kick.
In Bordeaux Lyon drive forward through Tino Kadewere. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Bordeaux.
In the minute 77, Lyon are coming forward and Joachim Andersen gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
Bordeaux awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Lyon.
Jimmy Briand for Bordeaux has been booked by Ruddy Buquet and receives a first yellow card.
Lyon are pushing forward but Joachim Andersen's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 81, It's a goal kick for the home team in Bordeaux.
In Bordeaux Lyon attack through Houssem Aouar. The finish is off target, however.
Maxwel Cornet (Lyon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 82, Bordeaux's Yacine Adli breaks free at Matmut Atlantique. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Yacine Adli of Bordeaux gets in a strike, but is off target.
Lyon have a goal kick.
In the minute 83, Rayan Cherki is replacing Karl Toko Ekambi for Lyon at Matmut Atlantique.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Bordeaux in their own half.
Maxence Caqueret is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Bordeaux to check on Yacine Adli, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 86, Maxence Caqueret is back on the pitch.
Yacine Adli for Bordeaux is back on the field again.
Corner awarded to Bordeaux.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bordeaux have a dangerous throw-in.
Bordeaux will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lyon.
In the minute 88, Tino Kadewere (Lyon) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Bordeaux at Matmut Atlantique.
Can Bordeaux get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
In the minute 89, In Bordeaux a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ruddy Buquet signals a Bordeaux throw-in in Lyon's half.
Lyon's Houssem Aouar misses with an attempt on goal.
Ruddy Buquet awards Bordeaux a goal kick.
Ruddy Buquet will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Ruddy Buquet awards Lyon a goal kick.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Bordeaux territory.
Ruddy Buquet signals a free kick to Bordeaux in their own half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
Bordeaux make their fourth substitution with Maxime Poundje replacing Remi Oudin.
